phrs.translation: 二轮弹药车, 肥料车, 双轮运货车, 施肥车

sentences.sentence: To that poor queen whom I saw pass in the tumbril!
sentences.translation: 慈悲的天主，那位可怜巴巴坐在囚车里打我面前走过的王后！

sentences.sentence: The second tumbril empties and moves on; the third comes up. Crash! -And the knitting-women, never faltering or pausing in their work, count Two.
sentences.translation: 第二辆囚车下完了人走掉了，第三辆开了上来。“嚓”——从不迟疑、从不间断地织着毛线的妇女们数道，“二。”
